picks.analysis: The Beavers are legit at Goss Stadium. Their rotation depth is elite, and Stanford's bats went cold in their last series. Lay the juice here - this line should be closer to -180.
Tigers getting plus money in Tuscaloosa is juicy. Bama's bullpen has been shaky, and LSU's lineup can mash. We're taking the value on the road dog.
Vandy at home against a Florida squad that looked flat last weekend. Not our strongest conviction, but the Commodores' pitching matchup gives them a slight edge.
